alert.note: Alert for Prince Georges (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued November 01 at 9:59AM EDT until November 01 at 11:00AM EDT by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM EDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Visibility one quarter mile or less in dense fog. * WHERE...In District of Columbia, District of Columbia. In Maryland, Prince Georges County. In Virginia, Prince William/Manassas/Manassas Park, Fairfax, Northern Fauquier and Southern Fauquier Counties, and Arlington/Falls Church/Alexandria. * WHEN...Until 11 AM EDT this morning. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.
